profile:
SGM Garage Doors is a garage door specialist for residential, commercial, agricultural and industrial applications, proudly serving Lunenburg/Queens County, Annapolis Valley, Halifax, Dartmouth and surrounding areas. Our team can give you personalized advice in purchasing a garage door, an installation that meets the highest industry standards, and unequalled after-sales service thanks to our maintenance and repair program. 

Our full range of products also includes electric garage door openers as well as many other accessories to go with your garage door. Think of us when it comes to buying, installing or repairing any type of garage door.  

We have two employees ready to give you the fastest service in the industry. Make an appointment to visit us, we are located at PO Box 171, 706 Hwy 325 in Blockhouse and open Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM and evenings by appointment. 

On behalf of our entire team, I thank you for considering our company. 

Shawn G. MacDonald 
Owner
SGM Garage Doors
hours: Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Evenings by appointment.
